title: Original Koffee Returns With Video for New Song “Koffee”: Watch
description: The Jamaican singjay and guitarist is back with her first song since 2022 debut Gifted
author: Jazz Monroe
excerpt: The Jamaican singjay and guitarist is back with her first song since 2022 debut Gifted
text: The Jamaican singjay and guitarist is back with her first song since 2022 debut GiftedKoffee, who now goes by Original Koffee, is back with her first single since her debut album, Gifted. The comeback track, “Koffee,” is released via Promised Land Recordings and features production from Ghanaian beatmaker GuiltyBeatz. Watch the Joshua Valle–directed video below.“Koffee” follows a quiet spell for the Jamaican singjay and guitarist, who did the rounds—including a Fallon performance of “Pull Up”—after following up her Grammy-winning debut EP, Rapture, with Gifted in 2022.Jazz Monroe is a music and culture writer based in London. His work also appears in The Guardian, The Independent, and elsewhere. ... Read more
html:
The Jamaican singjay and guitarist is back with her first song since 2022 debut Gifted

Koffee, who now goes by Original Koffee, is back with her first single since her debut album, Gifted. The comeback track, “Koffee,” is released via Promised Land Recordings and features production from Ghanaian beatmaker GuiltyBeatz. Watch the Joshua Valle–directed video below.

“Koffee” follows a quiet spell for the Jamaican singjay and guitarist, who did the rounds—including a Fallon performance of “Pull Up”—after following up her Grammy-winning debut EP, Rapture, with Gifted in 2022.

Jazz Monroe is a music and culture writer based in London. His work also appears in The Guardian, The Independent, and elsewhere. ... Read more
